description: Celtic defender set for La Liga switch as champions show interest in Manchester City fringe player...
title: Scottish gossip: Celtic, Hearts, Dundee, Starfelt, Turnbull, Vata, McTominay
title_page: Scottish gossip: Celtic, Hearts, Dundee, Starfelt, Turnbull, Vata, McTominay - BBC Sport
maintext:
Spanish side Celta Vigo are closing in on Celtic defender Carl Starfelt with a permanent transfer being agreed this weekend. (Fabrizio Romano), external
Joining Vigo, coached by Rafa Benitez, would allow Carl Starfelt to be nearer partner Jacynta Galabadaarachchi, who left Celtic Women for Lisbon club Sporting. (Sunday Mail), external
Celtic are in the queue for Manchester City midfielder Tommy Doyle, while Wolves are keen on a loan move for the 21-year-old. (Scottish Sun), external
Brendan Rodgers has flung open the door for David Turnbull to sign a new Celtic deal following his impressive performance against Ross County. (The Herald On Sunday), external
David Turnbull wants a new Celtic contract but Brendan Rodgers lays down challenge before making an offer. (Sunday Mail), external
Torino are interested in a move for Celtic teenager Rocco Vata, according to Italian outlet Tuttomercato. (Scottish Sun), external
Basel are "toying" with the idea of a move for former player Albian Ajeti but his Celtic wages could prove a stumbling block. (Blick via Sunday Mail, external)
Dundee manager Tony Docherty has confirmed interest in taking Everton midfielder Tyler Onyango on loan after St Johnstone decided against a move for the 20-year-old. (Sunday Mail), external
Rangers midfielder Alex Lowry turned down other clubs in England and Scotland to join Hearts on loan, says Tynecastle head coach Frankie McAvoy. (Edinburgh Evening News), external
